title: 加勒比海盗：规则的童话
ename: Pirates of the Caribbean: Tales of the Code: Wedlocked (2011)
body: In this short prequel to the first Pirates of the Caribbean movie, two feisty brides-to-be discover that they have something in common - the absent groom. Still, there are plenty of pirates who`d love to trade their goats for `em.
actors: 约翰·维克里.劳伦·马赫.亨利·马斯克.Walter Williamson
